title: Proficiency
content: tion and Persuasion Skills. One of the nine Eldritch Invocations available at Warlock level 2. Warlock Lvl 2 Bounty Hunter Feature Gain Proficiency in Investigation and learn the Thieves' Cant passive. Creatures you Restrain have a harder time escaping. One of the five Favored Enemy features available at Ranger Lvl 1 Ranger Lvl 1 Keeper of the Veil Feature You specialise in hunting creatures from other planes of existance. You gain proficiency in Arcana, and can cast Protection from Evil and Goo
